title: Switch prompts JSON URL to local /data.json

requirements.summary: Update the prompts JSON data source constant to use the same-origin relative path (/data.json) instead of the hardcoded viralprompts.in URL.
acceptanceCriteria: No remaining references in the frontend code to the hardcoded URL `https://viralprompts.in/data.json`.
When `fetchViralPrompts()` is used, it requests `/data.json` from the same origin (relative URL).

file_operations.description: Change `const DATA_URL = 'https://viralprompts.in/data.json';` to `const DATA_URL = '/data.json';` and ensure no other occurrences of the hardcoded `https://viralprompts.in/data.json` string remain in this file.
